## About the event

This event is part of the [Daylight Awareness Week 2025](https://daylight.academy/daylight-awareness-week-2025/), initiated by the [Daylight Academy](https://daylight.academy). The event is organized by the [Translational Sensory & Circadian Neuroscience Unit](https://www.tscnlab.org). Analyses of personal light exposure data were perfomed using the open-source software package [LightLogR](https://tscnlab.github.io/LightLogR/).
